import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './styles.css' import { RecordsResponse } from './types' import { formatDate } from './helpers' import Pagination from './pagination' const BASE_URL = 'http://localhost:8080' const Records = () => { const [recordsResponse, setRecordsResponse] = useState(); console.log(recordsResponse) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/records?linesPerPage=12`) .then(response => setRecordsResponse(response.data)) }, []); return (
{recordsResponse?.content.map(record => ( ))}
INSTANTE NOME IDADE PLATAFORMA GÊNERO TÍTULO DO GAME
{formatDate(record.moment)} {record.name} {record.age} {record.gamePlatform} {record.genreName} {record.gameTitle}
); } export default Records;
